column5: Hey all... Just wondering if anyone has a foavorite operator on simcoe in cooks bay... If you do if you can post the name or Pm me with info it would be greatly appreciated... Might try to go out tomorrow but hard to contact lots of the operators.  Bill
Yep I do. I usually go with Hanks Huts 905-722-3718. Out from Jacksons Point. They love me cause I'm a regular.  If you decide to go there "Tell Mike... "Dennison is on his way up soon!!"  dsn

lie,i said on another post mitchells huts in beaverton...great service gives you lotts of minnows checks on you at lunch and will bring you more minnows or take your catch in for you...and has washroom services on the ice and has clean well heated new huts cant beat him....cheers & good luck

If its on cooks the two best operators are either whitey with Simcoe Fishing Adventures in keswick or Peter Ice Cabins Of Gilford.  Both have good quality service but I think Peter price is cheaper and he is one of the most helpful with his ice reports.  http://icecabins.com/ http://www.simcoefishingadventures.com/
I was at Mitchells once. I was kinda disappointed cause they had no nets in the hut nor any gafs. Good thing I got skunked or I'd have problems landing fish.
